articles.headline: Revolutionizing Cancer Treatments: Peptides That Stick Around to Fight Solid Tumors
articles.hook: If you’re studying biochemistry or immunology, this could be the next big breakthrough in cancer treatment—using chemistry to make CAR-T cells smarter and more effective.
articles.source: Journal of the American Chemical Society

articles.headline: Revolutionizing Cancer Treatment: How Peptide Rings Outsmart Solid Tumors
articles.hook: If you’ve ever wondered how scientists make CAR-T cells smarter, this breakthrough could be the key to fighting stubborn solid tumors—without harming healthy tissue.
articles.source: Journal of the American Chemical Society
